com.markussecundus.forms.elements

Interface UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>

  • Type Parameters:
    Pos - Vector type used to define the position and dimensions of the element
    Rend - The renderer type that performs the drawing of the element to the screen or anywhere else
    All Superinterfaces:
    Drawable<Rend,Pos>, Element, UberElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAbstractLayout, BasicLinearLayout, PrimitivePositionalLayout

    public interface UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>
extends Drawable<Rend,Pos>, UberElement
    Basic inteface for any Drawable that groups together multiple other Drawables.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • drawableChildren

        ConstProperty<java.util.List<Drawable<Rend,Pos>>> drawableChildren()
        Instance of List containing only and all the children, that are to be drawn on the screen. Use it to add children to this, to remove them or to change their arrangement in any other way possible. All the children in here will be automatically present also in children. Try to avoid simultaneous modifications of both the lists.
        See Also:
        ElementLists

      • getDrawableChildren

        default java.util.List<Drawable<Rend,Pos>> getDrawableChildren()
        Shinier shortcut for calling drawableChildren().get().

      • childPosition

        ReadonlyProperty<Pos> childPosition(Drawable<Rend,Pos> child)
        Returns the position of child relative to the parent (this). Can return null if child isn't really the child of this.
        Parameters:
        child - the child of this whose position is being obtained

      • getChildPosition

        default Pos getChildPosition(Drawable<Rend,Pos> child)
        Shinier shortcut for calling getChildPosition().get(child).
        Parameters:
        child - the child of this whose position is being obtained
